programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if realtime audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ;-o fluidCCk.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
giengine fluidEngine ; soundfont path to manual/examples isfnum fluidLoad "22Bassoon.sf2", giengine, 1 fluidProgramSelect giengine, 1, isfnum, 0, 70
instr 1
mididefault 60, p3 midinoteonkey p4, p5 ikey init p4 ivel init p5 kpan line 0, p3, 127 ;panning from left to right fluidCCk giengine, 1, 10, kpan ;CC 10 = pan fluidNote giengine, 1, ikey, ivel
endin
instr 99
imvol init 7 asigl, asigr fluidOut giengine outs asigl*imvol, asigr*imvol
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i 1 0 4 48 100 i 1 4 2 50 120 i 1 6 1 53 80 i 1 7 1 45 70 i 1 8 1.5 48 80
i 99 0 10 ;keep instr 99 active e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
